replies.body:
{tag=bff56e079469477281be84fc627ea113}
Do not really know tou too well, but from what I can tell you are a cool dude and a good staff member.
Sadly a dying server but has potential if we can successfully advertise.  Has one of the best forum communities I have ever been a part of.
From what I can tell getting better.  There used to ( and sometimes still are ) be a problem with no staff members online.  

{tag=6248019ce74a42a4bf4b9cf1c189a72d}
Was always fun playing Nexus witheach other.  I will admit that I had my doubts when  you became staff but you proved me wrong and you are doing a great job. 
UNC color blue
Wolf
Have to be rinn since he was one of my first ever friends on Avicus
Nexus

{tag=fb57ed989f4140c78e61dee46d34d427}
You and I seemed to get along pretty well and I always enjoyed playing Nexus with you.  You seem like you have really changed from that "rebel" stage and I always thought you would make a great staff member once you matured a bit.
I have gotten bored with Avicus and pvp.  I have been really getting into adventure maps and my life has gotten crazy busy.  I might pop in a game every once and a while.
